content: HomeBlogGianluca Fiorelli Sr. SEO Consultant & Founder of @TheInbounder Gianluca Fiorelli "Recognized worldwide for his expertise about international SEO Gianluca Fiorelli is a strategic International SEO senior consultant and founder of @theinbounder conference, one of the most loved digital marketing conferences in South Europe. He has been working in the field of digital marketing and SEO since 2003. His specialties include SEO, branding and brand identity, digital marketing, content strategy, and brand awareness.
